data.caption: Clarification sought from Bharat Petroleum Corporation Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from Bharat Petroleum Corporation Ltd on February 01 2026 with reference to news appeared in https://energy.economictimes.indiatimes.com dated February 1 2026 quoting "BPCL Trafigura ink crude oil supply agreement".

The reply is awaited.
